name: Spartanmod
body:
###[Latest Version for 1.7.10](https://github.com/alray2569/SpartanMod/blob/master/builds/spartanmod-1.0.1.jar?raw=true) ### About SpartanMod is a Minecraft mod which I started developing in September 2015 at the request of a friend (spartanmine11 on Minecraft) who remarked that feathered hats should be available in Minecraft. I said "why not?" and so I wrote SpartanMod v1.0 on a Friday morning when I had nothing else to do. ### Download [Version 1.0.1 for Minecraft 1.7.10](https://github.com/alray2569/SpartanMod/blob/master/builds/spartanmod-1.0.1.jar?raw=true)
[Version 1.0 for Minecraft 1.7.10](https://github.com/alray2569/SpartanMod/blob/master/builds/spartanmod-1.0.jar?raw=true) ### Requirements * Minecraft 1.7.10 * [Minecraft Forge 1.7.10-10.13.0.1180 or higher](http://files.minecraftforge.net/) * Java build 17. ### Screenshots ![](http://i567.photobucket.com/albums/ss116/alr2569/2015-09-04_14.56.39_zpsojfhsici.png)
![](http://i567.photobucket.com/albums/ss116/alr2569/2015-09-04_14.56.21_zpsbhshnryy.png)
![](http://i567.photobucket.com/albums/ss116/alr2569/spartanmod1_zpsotlfgne5.png) ### Credits Andrew Ray (@alray2569; alr2569 in Minecraft): Code
Eric Shinkevich (spartanmine11 in Minecraft): Beta Testing
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
